hassToken.description: Long-lived access token for Home Assistant

tools.name: lights_control
tools.description: Control lights in Home Assistant. List all lights, get state of a specific light, turn lights on with brightness/color settings, or turn lights off.

tools.name: climate_control
tools.description: Control climate devices (thermostats, AC) in Home Assistant. List devices, get state, set HVAC mode, temperature, or fan mode.

tools.name: list_devices
tools.description: List all available Home Assistant devices with optional filtering by domain, area, or floor.

tools.name: cover_control
tools.description: Control covers (blinds, curtains, garage doors). Open, close, stop, or set position.

tools.name: media_player_control
tools.description: Control media players. Play, pause, stop, volume control, and source selection.

tools.name: fan_control
tools.description: Control fans. Turn on/off, set speed percentage, preset modes, oscillation.

tools.name: lock_control
tools.description: Control locks. Lock, unlock, or open (for locks that support unlatching).

tools.name: vacuum_control
tools.description: Control robot vacuums. Start, pause, stop, return to dock, clean spot, locate.

tools.name: alarm_control
tools.description: Control alarm systems. Arm (home, away, night), disarm, or trigger alarms.

tools.name: automation
tools.description: Manage Home Assistant automations. List all automations, toggle on/off, or trigger manually.

tools.name: scene
tools.description: Manage and activate Home Assistant scenes.

tools.name: notify
tools.description: Send notifications through Home Assistant notification services.

tools.name: system_info
tools.description: Get information about the MCP server including version and Home Assistant connection status.
